## Protocol.Overlay.SetInspectModeRequest.highlightConfig property

A descriptor for the highlight appearance of hovered-over nodes. May be omitted if `enabled == false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
highlightConfig?: HighlightConfig;
```
